1.zdf1-16.txt
	n	W	H
zdf1	580	100	330
zdf2	660	100	357
zdf3	740	100	384
zdf4	820	100	407
zdf5	900	100	434
zdf6	1532	3000	4872
zdf7	2432	3000	4852
zdf8	2532	3000	5172
zdf9	5032	3000	5172
zdf10	5064	6000	5172
zdf11	7564	6000	5172
zdf12	10064	6000	5172
zdf13	15096	9000	5172
zdf14	25032	3000	5172
zdf15	50032	3000	5172
zdf16	75032	3000	5172

The format of each of these data files is:
for each piece i (i=1,...,n): 
  width w_i  height h_i 


2.t1a-t7e,n1a-n7e.txt
The format of each of these data files is:
H,W
n
for each piece i (i=1,...,n): 
  width w_i  height h_i

beng1	20	25	30
beng2	40	25	57
beng3	60	25	84
beng4	80	25	107
beng5	100	25	134
beng6	40	40	36
beng7	80	40	67
beng8	120	40	101
beng9	160	40	126
beng10	200	40	156

The format of each of these data files is:
number n of items
width W for the strip 
for each piece i (i=1,...,n): 
  index i, width w_i and height h_i of item i.
